1505330.name: Spells 'n' Stuff Demo
1505330.description:
Spells 'n' Stuff Demo

Grab your wand and fly into battle in this magic arena FPS built exclusively for VR. You can cast spells with ease; simply swipe down with your wand to charge it and fire away. If you let go of your wand, it goes right back to your side for you to grab when you need. Avoid spells and air-attack by flying around, or throw a magic potion which teleports you to where it lands! Combine flying and teleporting to outwit your opponent.

Demo Features

  • Bot Match: Train in a 1v1 vs a SpellBot!
  • Types of Spells: Make use of different types of spells to beat your opponent. Either use the regular spell, the beam spell, the shotgun-like burst spell or the automatic-firing pip spell.
  • Map: Battle on a wizard's messy tabletop!
